name: Rogue Dagger+
description: After combat, inflict Def/Res-5 on foe through their next actions. Grants unit Def/Res+5 for 1 turn.

refinable.description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-6 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions. Also grants Def/Res+6 to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.
